name: Transparent Pentagram Choker
description:
A strip of clear PVC attached to two pieces of white ribbon stylised with a large Pentagram pendant. The ribbon is a long length so this choker will fit every neck! _______________________

"The Pentagram" is a symbol of a star encased in a circle. The upward point of the star is representative of the spirit. The other four points all represent an element; earth, fire, air and water. All these things contribute to life and are a part of each of us. To wear the symbol is to say you feel a connection with the elements and respect the earth."

name: Agate Geode Necklace

An Agate geode with a piece of Citrine in the centre hanging off a simple silver plated chain. A small, pewter Om charm finishes this piece off. :) _______________________

"Agates attract strength. Agate is a protection from bad dreams. It also protects from stress and energy drains. Agates have been used in jewelry since Biblical Babylonian times. They were used to ward off storms. They were prized gems in antiquity. The agates with banded colors were placed at the head of a sleeper to give rich and varied dreams.
Citrine energises every level of life. Cleanses the chakras and opens intuition. Attracts wealth, prosperity and success. It imparts joy, wonder, delight and enthusiasm. Raises self-esteem and self-confidence. Stimulates the brain, strengthening the intellect. Citrine promotes motivation, activates creativity and encourages self-expression. "

name: Crystal Healing Packs
description:
Each pack contains 4 small/medium tumblestones (not as pictured, they will be different) in a small velvet bag with white sage. Packs can be used by carrying on yourself, holding the stones, meditating with them, putting inside your clothes, under your pillow, in your bath, near your work area or at your Chakra energy centres. Or of course, however you wish. You can add a cleansing stone to each bag which, along with the white sage, will ensure your crystals are always cleansed. If not, run your crystals under cold water every few weeks to cleanse them of the negative energy the removed from you. Each pack comes with a card explaining care (if needed) and information on each crystal. ___________________________

Stress Pack: the stones in this set will provide a calming effect on the emotions and mind which aid in decreasing stress. Keep around you in stressful times by holding or meditating with the stones.
Love Pack: the stones in this set help with bringing in love. They also aid in teaching self-love and open up the heart centre. Good as a gift to a significant other. It is also common for females to carry love stones in their bra, as it is believed that this can attract love.
Luck Pack: the stones in this pack aid in attracting good fortune, bringing in luck and helping us to feel lucky. Keep these on yourself at times you feel you need luck or around your work place.
Meditation Pack: this combination of stones increases intuition, filters negative emotions and enhances spiritual development. Keep around you whilst in the act of meditation.
Self Esteem Pack: this pack aids in enhancing your mental strength, releasing negativity, promotes positive life changes and promotes self-worth. Keep around you daily, in your clothes and specifically in any room where you see yourself daily.
Grief/Loss Pack: this combination of stones provides stress relief, provides a calming sensation, and provides peace and balance to your emotions. Hold in your hands in times of need.
Sleep Pack: this combination will aid in calming and quieting the mind to allow a well deserved rest. Keep under your pillow at night.

Chakra Set this set contains SEVEN Chakra sones relating to the Crown, Third Eye, Throat, Heart, Solar Plexis, Sacral and Base Chakras. Perfect for starting crystal healing. (Stone examples shown in second picture.)

Each stone is unique, meaning it will slightly vary in shape, size and colour.

name: Tree of Life Quartz Necklace
description:
<center>A Tree of Life pendant hanging off a row of small Quartz stones. This necklace hangs off a white/silver plated chain which sits long with no clasp.
___________________________</br>
</br>
"The Tree of Life in its various forms is recognised in all cultures as a symbol of immortality and eternal life. From ancient Chinese and Egyptian culture to Germanic paganism and Mesoamerica, it has been sought after throughout the ages. And, while depicted in many different contexts, the imagery across all cultures is essentially the same. Not to be confused with the Tree of Knowledge of Good and Evil, the tree of Life is the tree whose fruit gives eternal life to all who might obtain it. In addition to its religious references, it is a reminder of our past (roots - ancestry), present (tree body - knots included) and future (fruit – labor and posterity)."</br></br>

Each stone is unique, meaning it will slightly vary in shape, size and colour.</br></br>

Using the seven colours of the spectrum, Colour Therapy aims to balance and enhance our body's energy centres/chakras and also to help stimulate our body's own healing process."
Violet - crown:
Personal identification with infinite. Wisdom. Peace.
Indigo - third eye:Clears subconscious to channel intuition. Balanced state of mind.
Blue - throat:Ability to verbalise. Expresses truth through power of spoken word.
Green - heart:Release emotionally suppressed trauma. Expresses love in action.
Yellow - solar plexus:Positive use of personal power. Manifest goals.
Orange - sacral:Utalisation of creative forces. High soul procreation.
Red - base:Ground spirit forces in body. Gain ability to work lovingly on the physical plane.
